channel.title: CVE Feed for POSIMYTH -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for POSIMYTH -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-34373|2024-05-06T18:31:19.521Z -- POSIMYTH -- The Plus Addons for Elementor Page Builder Lite
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in POSIMYTH The Plus Addons for Elementor Page Builder Lite allows Stored XSS.This issue affects The Plus Addons for Elementor Page Builder Lite: from n/a through 5.4.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-30435|2024-03-29T17:26:31.943Z -- POSIMYTH -- The Plus Blocks for Block Editor | Gutenberg
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in POSIMYTH The Plus Blocks for Block Editor | Gutenberg allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects The Plus Blocks for Block Editor | Gutenberg: from n/a through 3.2.5.
